title: Maiz y Chile
typeOfFood: Organic, Fast food, Delivery, Take-out, Mexican, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Vegetarian except for an occasional meat. Small store selling veggie and organic versions of regional Mexican specialties revolving around corn and chile: chileatole, pipian and chocolate tamales, tostadas, enfrijoladas, garnachas, molletes, and soups. Also sells its own brands of chiles, pickles, and atoles.
